objectives: I am a passionate developer with 9 years of experience in web and mobile development. I love coding, solving complex problems, and learning new technologies.

workExperiences.responsibilities: Development of NodeJS, React, and React Native applications with MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.

Responsible for the redesign, evolution, maintenance, and deployment of a React Native mobile application (iOS and Android). Feature development with Redux and REST API in PHP. Creation of unit and functional tests (Jest, React Native Testing Library, ADB, PHPUnit) with GitLab CI. Development and maintenance of an Android Java application for biometric time clocks (RxJava, Room).

workExperiences.company: Cawita, web app agency (La Colle sur Loup)
workExperiences.responsibilities: Development of a NodeJS, MongoDB, Angular web application focused on the digitalization of business processes.
Backend development of Drupal 8 plugins and themes.
Development of an Angular web application and a REST API in PHP. Creation of a Node.js REST API for geocoding (Google API Geocoding, OpenData API Adresse, API IGN).
Development of features within the backend team for TYPO3 / FLOW showcase websites.
